tool_description: Calculates comprehensive financial ratios including liquidity, profitability, leverage, and efficiency ratios from financial statement data.

balance_sheet_data.description: Balance sheet line items and values

income_statement_data.description: Income statement line items and values

cash_flow_data.description: Cash flow statement line items and values

annualize_quarterly.description: Annualize quarterly data for ratio calculations

decimal_precision.description: Number of decimal places for ratio results (1-4)

error_messages: Insufficient financial data: Balance sheet, income statement, or cash flow data is incomplete. Ensure all required line items are present.
Invalid ratio category: Use categories from [liquidity, profitability, leverage, efficiency, activity, coverage].
Invalid calculation method: Use one of [STANDARD, CONSERVATIVE, AGGRESSIVE].
Data format error: Financial data must be in format 'Line Item: Value'. Ensure proper formatting.
Division by zero error: Some ratios cannot be calculated due to zero denominators in the financial data.
Invalid currency code: Use standard 3-letter currency codes (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.).
Invalid decimal precision: Decimal places must be between 1 and 4.
Negative critical values: Some financial values are negative where positive values are expected, affecting ratio reliability.
usage: Provide balance_sheet_data, income_statement_data, and cash_flow_data arrays. Optionally specify ratio_categories, industry_code, calculation_method, and other parameters. Returns calculated financial ratios organized by category.

liquidity_ratios.description: Current ratio, quick ratio, cash ratio calculations

data_quality_score.description: Quality score of input data used for calculations
